perturbation.original_text: 2. Term. The term of this Agreement shall commence on the date hereof and shall continue in full force and effect for a period of three (3) years from the date hereof (the “Initial Term”).
perturbation.changed_text: 2. Term. The term of this Agreement shall commence on the date hereof and shall continue in full force and effect for a period of one (1) year from the date hereof (the “Initial Term”).
perturbation.explanation: The initial term of the agreement is now defined as one year, conflicting with another section of the contract that might assume or state the term is three years, leading to disputes about the agreement's duration.

perturbation.original_text: 4. Grant of Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Company hereby grants to Athlete, during the Term, the exclusive right and license to use the Company Marks solely in connection with Athlete’s performance of the Services in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 4. Grant of Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Company hereby grants to Athlete, during the Term, the non-exclusive right and license to use the Company Marks solely in connection with Athlete’s performance of the Services in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The right to use the company marks is initially defined as exclusive but is changed to non-exclusive. This creates a contradiction as the original contract intended to give all rights over the company marks only to the athlete. Now there is an ambiguity on who to assign such rights.

perturbation.original_text: 11. Termination. This Agreement may be terminated by Company upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to Athlete if Athlete fails to perform the Services in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 11. Termination. This Agreement may be terminated by Company upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Athlete if Athlete fails to perform the Services in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The notice period for termination is reduced from thirty days to ten days. This contradicts any clause that relies on the initial 30-day notice, particularly if athlete have some time constraint to perform the services.
